subject: Creativity
title: Openness to Experience: The Creativity Personality Trait
description: One-minute skill: Openness to Experience: The Creativity Personality Trait.

hook.text: Of the Big Five personality traits, one predicts creative achievement far better than the rest: Openness.

buildup.text: Openness to Experience includes curiosity, imagination, aesthetic sensitivity, and willingness to try new things.

discovery.text: Studies show Openness correlates with divergent thinking at r = 0.39 â€” a strong effect in personality research.

twist.text: Openness is partly genetic (heritability ~57%) but can be increased through travel, art exposure, and novelty-seeking.

climax.text: Psychedelic research shows that a single session can increase Openness scores for over a year.

punchline.text: The most creative personality trait is the willingness to be surprised.

quiz.question: Which Big Five personality trait best predicts creative achievement?
